name: Chroma (itch) (Dani's Notebook)
description:
Hi! This is my first game Chroma, done a little bit in over two weeks, I hope you have fun and that you don't come across any bug that ruin your experience, have a nice day!

Chroma focuses in coordination, you'll have to match the color of your proyectiles to the color of the asteroids heading your way, good luck!
